issue.title: Publishing on atlas_sim_interface_state from bag file causes issues with simulated robot

content.raw:
I can duplicate the effect by replaying this bag file after starting up Gazebo.
It causes the robot to "jump", then fall over.  I notice that the current_behavior seems to oscillate between 0 and 3 or 7 after it falls.
content.html: I can duplicate the effect by replaying this bag file after starting up Gazebo. It causes the robot to "jump", then fall over. I notice that the current_behavior seems to oscillate between 0 and 3 or 7 after it falls.
